tool_description: Our QR code generator API allows you to generate QR codes for various types of data, including text, URLs, phone numbers, SMS messages, and email addresses. The API returns a QR code image in JPG format.
name: QR code generator with multiple datatypes .
title: QR code generator with multiple datatypes .
tool_name: QR code generator with multiple datatypes .

api_list.name: getQrcode
api_list.description: This API will return you an URL of the QR Code image that you can easily embed on to website or download it for your other needs.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Select one of the QR code formats to generate. url,text,telno,mailto,smsto

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Enter value as per your QR code type. Eg: url=https://www.google.com,text=Some text,telno=9142545474,smsto=8542487542
